title: What does Caitlyn have against yordels?
body:
The "Yordle Snap Trap" appears to be a bear trap with a cupcake as bait. So why is it a "yordle" snap trap? 
Do yordles have a chemical dependence on cupcake frosting? 
Is there a major yordle-based crime ring in Piltover? 
Is the enigmatic "C" a yordle?

Why does Caitlyn have a nominally anti-yordle device when her background doesn't mention yordles at all?

replies.body:
Because it's kind of funny.

Would you rather it be named: Nondiscriminatory snap trap?

But there must be a reason yordles were picked. I must know!

Alternate theory: Cait is a foxy-batman-lady, therefor yordles killed her parents.
Well, there *is* the mysterious 'C' she's been looking for.........
hopefully "C" will be some Yordle that she has tailored all of her weaponry against in an attempt to destroy.
I think it's because Yordle's are more likely to be baited in by cupcakes just like all champions are likely to be baited in by Teemos.

I thought the trap was made by Yordles, and not designed for use against Yordles. The mechanism was put together by tiny yordle hands, the cupcake is actually a fullsized cake baked in a yordle oven.

I think it's like how Urgot's E is not made to corroding other Noxians, Noxian Corrosive Charge is a Corrosive Charge made BY Noxians.
In bot games the Caitlin Bot, under the right circumstances, actually does say, "I've got a cupcake for you, little Yordle."
What circumstances are those? That sounds interesting
If someone is playing a Yordle she will say this. But since there are 4 other bots she might not, since a max of 2 bots may speak at the beginning of the game and sometimes only one does.

You place the traps to catch Teemo before he shrooms all of Piltover, thus is her job as sheriff.

FYI I max it if the other team has a Teemo and wait until he goes invisible to place it underneath him. My hatred for him runs deep.

Maybe at one time Riot wanted her to be an acclaimed Yordle hunter, rather than the Sheriff of Piltover. Heck, she's got her 90 caliber net too. Perfect for snagging those dastardly yordles on the run.
Teemo is a yordle. Teemo is a bastard. She must think all yordles are like Teemo.
Honestly, ever since I got Tristana on ARAM ("A yordle? Bah!") I've been considering that Cait might just be yordle-racist.
Could also be that Heim developed the trap, you know, because of Piltover.  So it's a yordle-made snap trap.
{{champion:121}}  dislikes Yordles too. Or at least, he thinks they are pathetic. I like that guy.
